parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Away from the synagogue, expelled from the synagogue, excommunicated. From apo and sunagoge; excommunicated.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular

str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.
From pros and phero; to bear towards, i.e. Lead to, tender, treat.
Service rendered to God, perhaps simply: worship. From latreuo; ministration of God, i.e. Worship.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
